def_cn: （通常指工会成员）在…设置罢工纠察队，在…外抗议
def_en: When a group of people, usually trade union members, picket a place of work, they stand outside it in order to protest about something, to prevent people from going in, or to persuade the workers to join a strike.

def_cn: 罢工纠察队员；示威者；抗议者
def_en: Pickets are people who are picketing a place of work.
